meanings.definition: Relating to the interaction of magnetic fields and electrically conducting fluids.
meanings.sent1: The magnetohydrodynamic process helps us understand how magnetic fields affect fluids.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use magnetohydrodynamic principles to study the behavior of conducting fluids in magnetic fields.
meanings.sent3: The magnetohydrodynamic dance between the magnetic fields and fluids is like a graceful waltz.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a magnetohydrodynamic storm, swirling with magnetic fields and conducting fluids.
meanings.sent5: The magnetohydrodynamic effect creates a mesmerizing display of fluid movement under magnetic influence.

meanings.definition: Involving the study of the behavior of electrically conducting fluids in the presence of magnetic fields.
meanings.sent1: Understanding magnetohydrodynamic phenomena is crucial in studying fluid behavior in magnetic fields.
meanings.sent2: The magnetohydrodynamic research focuses on how electrically conducting fluids behave in the presence of magnetic fields.
meanings.sent3: The magnetohydrodynamic experiment turned into a colorful display of fluid dynamics under magnetic influence.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts flowed like magnetohydrodynamic currents, guided by the magnetic fields around him.
meanings.sent5: The magnetohydrodynamic study revealed the intricate dance of fluids and magnetic fields.
